llm.feedback: The Up/Down section is fine – it lists four clear scenarios with drivers, watch‑list signals, and evidence‑based probabilities (OGK8WLL69).  The trade/outlook line, however, violates the required format: it mixes price levels, uses “4800” as a field, and ends with an ambiguous “70”.  Rewrite it as a single, properly‑punctuated swing‑trade line: **Long | 1‑3 months | 4600 | 4400 | 5200 | 2:1 | Fed rate hike or regulatory tightening | Fed cuts or ETF launch | 60% | 70**.  Keep the driver, trigger, and invalidation citations (OGK8WLL69) inline if desired, but do not add any extra text or fields.  No other changes are needed.
